description: Default fixture data for SourceActivation (PR-4 fixture-only mode)

items.text_primary: Excited to share our latest product update! We've been listening to your feedback and made some amazing improvements. Check out the new features that help you work smarter, not harder. #ProductUpdate #Innovation #CustomerFirst

Behind the scenes at our office! Our team is hard at work building the future of content creation. Love seeing the energy and collaboration. What does your workspace look like? #TeamWork #StartupLife #BehindTheScenes
items.text_secondary: The speaker in the video says: Welcome to our Monday standup. Today we're going to talk about our Q1 goals and how we're tracking against them. First up, let's look at user engagement metrics...

items.title: How we reduced customer churn by 40%
items.text_primary: Want to know how we reduced customer churn by 40%? Here's our secret sauce... #BusinessTips #CustomerSuccess #SaaS
items.text_secondary: Hey everyone, today I want to share how we reduced our customer churn by forty percent in just six months. The key was really understanding why customers were leaving in the first place. We did exit interviews, analyzed support tickets, and found three main pain points...

items.title: The tool that changed our workflow
items.text_primary: This one tool changed how our entire team works. Game changer alert! #Productivity #WorkTools #Efficiency

items.title: Announcing our Series B funding
items.text_primary: Thrilled to announce our $50M Series B funding round! This investment will help us accelerate our mission to democratize content creation for businesses of all sizes. Thank you to our investors, customers, and incredible team who made this possible. Here's what we're planning next...

items.title: Industry insights: AI in content creation
items.text_primary: The content creation landscape is evolving rapidly. Here are 5 trends we're seeing in 2026 that every marketer should know about: 1. AI-assisted writing is becoming mainstream 2. Short-form video continues to dominate 3. Authenticity over polish 4. Community-driven content 5. Cross-platform consistency. What trends are you seeing in your industry?

items.title: Complete Guide to Content Strategy in 2026
items.text_primary: In this comprehensive guide, we walk through everything you need to know about building a content strategy that actually works. From audience research to content calendars, distribution to measurement.
items.text_secondary: Welcome to our complete guide to content strategy in 2026. Today we're going to cover everything from the basics to advanced tactics that will help you create content that resonates with your audience and drives real business results. Let's start with the fundamentals...

items.text_primary: Quick tip Tuesday: The best time to post isn't one-size-fits-all. Test different times with your audience and let the data guide you. Here's what we've learned from analyzing 1000+ posts across our client accounts. #SocialMediaTips #ContentStrategy #MarketingTips
items.text_secondary: Hey everyone, for today's quick tip I want to talk about posting times. A lot of people ask me when is the best time to post on Instagram. The truth is, it depends on YOUR specific audience. Let me show you how to find your optimal posting windows using insights...
